entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 10:32 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
